VirtualRmi - Class in it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi
Class VirtualSocket: the class is a subclass of the Virtual View, so it implements the same features, but it's responsible to effectively manage the communication with the rmi technology.
VirtualRmi(RmiClientInterface, Server, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.server.network.rmi.VirtualRmi
Class constructor for a new Virtual rmi associated with a unique id, that runs on the Server and associated with the rmi client interfare to call the remote method, it also load from a settings file the timeout of the rmi player for the disconnection
